plugin._field_explanation: Use these values for WWise reverb.

_field_string_id.name: Environment name#Name of the environment from WWise. This will be a DSP effect with Environmental Effect checked.
Environment name player#Name of the environment from WWise. This will be a DSP effect with Environmental Effect checked.

_field_custom.name: Dry mix value#0 to 1 with 0 being none, and 1 being full.

_field_real.name: Dry mix value#0 to 1 with 0 being none, and 1 being full.

_field_custom.name: Wet mix value#0 to 1 with 0 being none, and 1 being full.

_field_real.name: Wet mix value#0 to 1 with 0 being none, and 1 being full.

_field_custom.name: Player wet mix value#0 to 1 with 0 being none, and 1 being full.

_field_real.name: Player wet mix value#0 to 1 with 0 being none, and 1 being full.

plugin._field_explanation: This will override obstruction and occlusion if you set the cutoff frequency to a non-zero value. Use the individual classes' "forced lowpass wet mix" value to alter the mix.
